title: Which is true for economy operating inside its PPC

content.question: For an economy that is operating inside its production possibilities curve, which of the following is true?

choices.label: It can increase the production of both goods.
Its population is growing faster than the economyâ€™s ability to increase production.
It is using all available resources efficiently.
It cannot move to a point on the production possibilities curve with available technology.
It lacks the resources to increase production beyond its current output.

content.answer: It can increase the production of both goods.
